targets.rawSql:
SELECT(
SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category  g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) >= 1) as Total)
+
(SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                 FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                 where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                 and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) > 0) as Total)

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) >= 1
      ) as Total

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (6)
                        and a.verificado is null
                        and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) = 1) as Total

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (6)
                        and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI'))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) = 1) as Total

SELECT trunc(((SELECT (COUNT(*)::decimal)as atendido
                from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
                      FROM gestion.responsable
                      where id_caso in (select a.id
                      from gestion.caso a
                      inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                      inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                      inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                      where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                      and g.name in ($subcateg)
                      --and d.active = 1
                      and e.principal is true
                      and d.id_estatus in (6)
                      and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI'))
                      group by id_caso
                      HAVING count(id_caso) = 1) as Total)*100/(SELECT (COUNT(*)::decimal)
                                                                from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
                                                                FROM gestion.responsable
                                                                where id_caso in (select a.id
                                                                from gestion.caso a
                                                                inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                                                                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                                                                inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                                                                inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                                                                where r.nombre in ($resolutorg)
                                                                and g.name in ($subcateg)
                                                                --and d.active = 1
                                                                and e.principal is true
                                                                and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))
                                                                group by id_caso
                                                                HAVING count(id_caso) = 1) as Total))::decimal,2) as porcentaje;

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.categry g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                 FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                 where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                 and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) > 0) as Total

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                 FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                 where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                 and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (6)
                        and a.verificado is null 
                        and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) = 1) as Total

SELECT COUNT(*)
from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
      FROM gestion.responsable
      where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                 FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                 where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                 and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (6)
                        and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI'))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) > 0) as Total

SELECT trunc(((SELECT COUNT(*)
                from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
                FROM gestion.responsable
                where id_caso in (select a.id
                        from gestion.caso a
                        inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                        inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                        where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                 FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                 where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                 and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                        and g.name in ($subcateg)
                        --and d.active = 1
                        and e.principal is true
                        and d.id_estatus in (6)
                        and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI'))
      group by id_caso
      HAVING count(id_caso) > 0) as Total)*100/(SELECT (COUNT(*)::decimal)
                                                from (SELECT id_caso,count(*)
                                                FROM gestion.responsable
                                                where id_caso in (select a.id
                                                from gestion.caso a
                                                inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_categoria
                                                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                                                inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
                                                inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = e.id_resolutorio
                                                where r.id in (SELECT id 
											                                         FROM gestion.resolutorio
											                                         where nombre in ($resolutorea)
											                                         and id_estado in (SELECT id FROM gestion.resolutorio where nombre in ($resolutorg)))
                                                and g.name in ($subcateg)
                                                --and d.active = 1
                                                and e.principal is true
                                                and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))
                                                group by id_caso
                                                HAVING count(id_caso) > 0) as Total))::decimal,2) as porcentaje;

SELECT a.nombre ::Text "GOBERNACION UNICOS",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	--b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	--c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.direccion::Text "DIR",
      	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name /*f.nombre::Text*/ "CATEGORIA",
	  	--f.name::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	--null /*z.latitud::decimal*/ "LATITUD",
	  	--null /*z.longitud::decimal*/ "LONGITUD",
	  	to_char(a.fecha,'dd-mm-YY') as "FECHA GENERADO",
    	to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY') as "FECHA ULTIMO ESTATUS",
	  	--null /*case when m.nombre is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.nombre end::Text*/ "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            --inner join gestion.sub_categoria g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id 
          --  inner join gestion.ubicacion z on z.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso --and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            --LEFT JOIN  gestion.extra_categoria m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where -- h.active = 1
			 k.nombre in ($resolutorg)
			and f.name in ($subcateg)
			and j.principal is true
			and h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT a.nombre::Text "ALCALDIA UNICOS",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    --	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    --	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    	a.direccion::Text "DIR",
    	a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
	  	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA",
	  --	g.nombre::Text "SUBCATEG",
	  	--z.latitud::decimal "LATITUD",
	  --	z.longitud::decimal "LONGITUD",
	  	to_char(a.fecha,'dd-mm-YY') as "FECHA GENERADO",
    	to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY') as "FECHA ULTIMO ESTATUS",
	  --	case when m.nombre is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.nombre end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
		i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            --inner join gestion.sub_categoria g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id
            --inner join gestion.ubicacion z on z.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso --and j.id_user is not null
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
			inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio kk ON kk.id_estado = k.id_estado 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            --LEFT JOIN  gestion.extra_categoria m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
      where  /*h.active = 1
			and*/ k.nombre in ($resolutorea) and kk.nombre in ($resolutorg)
			and f.name in ($subcateg)
			and j.principal is true
			and h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
      --and h.active = 1

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS CON RESPONSABILIDAD COMPARTIDA  ($resolutorg )

targets.rawSql:
select --row_number() OVER (ORDER BY m.nombre) AS "NUM", 
    m.nombre::Text "ALCALDIAS",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", 
		trunc(sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
		from gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
		inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso
		inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.resolutorio zz on zz.id =  z.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = z.id_municipio
		where  /*d.active = 1 
		and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
		and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
		and z.nombre in ($resolutorea) and zz.nombre in ($resolutorg)
		and e.principal is true
		group by m.nombre order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" DESC

select --row_number() OVER (ORDER BY m.nombre) AS "NUM", 
		m.nombre::Text "PARROQUIAS",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", 
		trunc(sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
		from gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.parroquia m on m.id = a.id_parroquia
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
		inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso
		inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
		--inner join gestion.resolutorio zz on zz.id =  z.id_estado
		where /* d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
		--and e.id_resolutorio = 125 
		and z.nombre in ($resolutorg) --and zz.nombre in ($resolutorg)
		and e.principal = true
		group by m.nombre order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

select --row_number() OVER (ORDER BY m.nombre) AS "NUM", 
		m.nombre::Text "PARROQUIAS",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", 
		trunc(sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
		from gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.parroquia m on m.id = a.id_parroquia
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
		inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso
		inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.resolutorio zz on zz.id =  z.id_estado
		where  /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
		--and e.id_resolutorio = 125 
		and z.nombre in ($resolutorea) and zz.nombre in ($resolutorg)
		and e.principal = true
		group by m.nombre order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

list.definition:
SELECT  c.name FROM gestion.category c
 inner join gestion.category cc on cc.id = c.parent where cc.parent is null and c.id <= 17
 order by c.id asc
list.label: SUB CATEG
list.name: subcateg
list.query:
SELECT  c.name FROM gestion.category c
 inner join gestion.category cc on cc.id = c.parent where cc.parent is null and c.id <= 17
 order by c.id asc

list.definition: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1  and id = 1
list.label: GOBERNACIONES
list.name: resolutorg
list.query: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 1  and id = 1

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a inner join gestion.resolutorio b on a.id_estado = b.id_estado where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2 and b.nombre in ($resolutorg)
list.label: ALCALDIAS
list.name: resolutorea
list.query: SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.resolutorio a inner join gestion.resolutorio b on a.id_estado = b.id_estado where a.id_tipo_resolutorio = 2 and b.nombre in ($resolutorg)
